articles.title: Drugs deaths in Scotland soar to record level - The Guardian
articles.description: Country has Europe’s worst drugs death rate, more than three-and-a-half times higher than rest of UK
articles.content:
Drugs deaths in Scotland have hit a new record after 1,339 people died last year from overdoses or the cumulative effects of years of addiction.
